A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Wowza\, what a stinker!  

Disney: I would like my 3 hours\, $50+ for a crappy afternoon at the theater\, my Luke and Leia Skywalker and my Star Wars back from ya greedy money grubbers.

For 40 years this saga gave us thrills\, heroes\, awesome battles and hope.  You gave us bad acting\, corny dialogue\, terrible new characters\, cheesy CGI and no progression from the last episode.  

I was disappointed\, my spouse was angry and my kids were bored.  Way to take the first Star Wars movie featuring Luke Skywalker in decades and blow it as sky high as you did.  That takes real talent.  Way to go.
